name: places/ChIJP3kS6O5ZwokRx6au9qKmPc0
formattedAddress: 37 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 37 W 65th St, New York, NY 10023-6610, USA

originalText.text: There are likely hundreds of schools and thousands of people in New York City teaching piano, and we feel lucky we found NY Piano School. Our son was 3.5 years old when he started, and by the time he turned 4 he was in a room alongside other children and adults, playing a brief piece at his first recital. It was very exciting for him! The weekly lessons are short, but the focus and pace is great. Our son's teacher is very experienced and patient, and more importantly makes making music fun. We appreciate the style of learning and would recommend this school to anyone, young or old, looking to learn piano!

originalText.text:
I found the NY Piano School and I'm so happy I decided to take lessons as an adult there because I've had a great experience so far. Alex and my instructor are highly responsive and have worked with my availability to schedule my lessons.

As a beginner the teachers that I have worked with have been wonderful, patient, and knowledgeable. I've made a lot of progress since I took my first lesson and every week I'm excited and looking forward to my next one. If you'd like to take lessons I highly recommend the NY Piano School!

originalText.text: Wonderful school with great instructors that take time to approach piano with their students' interests, strengths and weaknesses in mind!
